titleStmt.title: Godliness no friend to rebellion, or enemy to civil government Being the substance of a sermon occasionally preached at Great Yarmouth, Octob. 25. 1673. By a lover of peace and truth.
titleStmt.author: Lover of peace and truth.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for George Palmer, at the Royal Oak without Temple-bar,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
